sentences.en: People who have anorexia or bulimia are at risk of bone loss.
sentences.cn: 患有厌食症和食欲过盛的人处于骨质流失的风险中。

sentences.en: The mouth was more emphasized by women with anorexia or bulimia.
sentences.cn: 有厌食症或暴食症的女性更倾向于描绘嘴部。

sentences.en: It will lead to bulimia later destabilizing relations in a group.
sentences.cn: 这样会导致暴食症影响将来它们将来在族群中的关系。
